name: Monique%27s_husband
text:
Monique's husband
A man, the husband of Monique, was involved in an altercation at the Roadhouse.
Biography
The man saw his wife standing with another man while they watched Audrey Horne dance. Shouting, he threw his empty beer bottle at them and attacked the other man. The fight caused Audrey to rush over to her husband Charlie and beg him to get her out of there.
